security: The document is marked SECRET and states 'RETURN TO CIA Background Use Only Do Not Reproduce', indicating that its contents are sensitive and not for wider dissemination.
summary: This document is a pseudonym assignment form assigning the alias Catherine Marie STONE [037] to the project or agent ALLADIE, which involves the debriefing of a Soviet intelligence defector.
summary_one_paragraph: On February 21, 1957, a pseudonym assignment form was completed, assigning the alias Catherine Marie STONE [037] to the project or agent ALLADIE, described as the debriefing of a Soviet intelligence defector. The form indicates that this pseudonym is not to be used in cable traffic. S.N. Harrison is listed as the Case Officer for the Branch/Unit.
title: Pseudonym Assignment: Catherine Marie STONE [037] for Project ALLADIE
